Downloads for Microsoft Windows XP, Vista and 7

Python GEdit

Downloads for Mac OS X

Python GEdit

Install on Ubuntu and Ubuntu based distros

Python GEdit

Install on Debian and debian based distros 


  $ sudo apt-get install python2.6 gedit

Install on Fedora, Red Hat


  $ su
  $ yum install python2.6 gedit

Install on SUSE


  $ su
  $ zypper install python2.6 gedit
